casebody.data:
99-0648 (La. 4/23/99)

Melissa BORDELON v. Charles Michael BORDELON. No. 99-C-0648. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Bordelon, Melissa; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Rapides 9th Judicial District Court Div. “E” Number 17402; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-1444

Denied.

KIMBALL, J. would grant the writ. KNOLL, J. not on panel.
